testcase.name: Trust Wallet Legal Screen
testcase.system-out: Given user launches is on the legal screen..................................passed When user clicks on the privacy policy......................................passed And user closes the privacy policy..........................................passed Then user clicks on the terms of service....................................passed And user closes the terms of policy.........................................passed And user clicks on the check box to accept the terms of service and privacy policy.passed Then user clicks on the continue button.....................................passed

testcase.name: Trust Wallet Welcome Screen
testcase.system-out: Given user launches the trust wallet app....................................passed When user can see the inscription private and secure, create a new wallet and i already have a wallet buttons.passed And user can swipe to the right to see the inscription all assets in one place.passed And user can swipe to the right again to see the inscription trade assets...passed And user can swipe to the right to see the last screen with the inscription explore decentralized apps.passed Then user clicks on the create a new wallet button..........................passed
